name: Zen Vegetable Garden
description:
For 10 day game Jam, theme is food. This game is all about growing your own food and managing your fields.

a time limit of 5 minutes is applied as a natural stopping point. It's a bit of an antithesis of the game title, but lets one compare the game, and would love feedback on this. 

Out of scope on this 10 day game jam:

  • Day/Night Cycle
  • infinite loop/ever expanding - This can be done to some extent fairly easy if there is any interest
  • nice UI
  • Saving/Online Highscore
